page.title: 12SERVICES IN DEEPCAR/WORTLEY
page.content: {GOVERNMENT:}WORTLEY has its own Parish Council, but comes under Barnsley M.B. Council. DEEPCAR has 1 Liberal and 1 Independant councillor on Stocksbridge Town/Parish Council, which has 3 Liberals on Sheffield City Council. Despite the improved services there is still resentment over much higher rates than in the former West Riding C.C. Turnouts in this district tend to be higher than in Sheffield. {SERVICES}in Deepcar consist of: Police sub-station, Sub-Post Office, Doctor's Surgery, 'Dumpit' refuse site, Mobile Library. Water supply comes from Langsett Res. nearby.{Nearest}Health Centre, Fire Stn., Secondary Sch. and College, Banks, Market, Library are in Stocksbridge(2 mls.). Hospitals are in Sheffield. The area is well catered for by the South Yorks. Times weekly newspaper having local editions.
